title: Love on the Run
description: (Revised edition 10/2012) "Love on the Run" is the 7th book by Colleen Wait. In this book, Marnie is a college student with a bright future. She has great friends, a loving family, a boyfriend, and plans of furthering her education. On the night of her engagement things begin to unravel and tragedy strikes. Things are not as they seemed. Truths are revealed as lies. To vent her frustrations and prevent a mental breakdown Marnie takes up running where she finds herself, her confidence, and eventually finds her joy.
author: Colleen Wait
